domain_description: You will be given a list of 20 international holidays, and asked to input when they occurred in 2015.

task 01.description: estimate the date for 2016's Colombus Day.

task 02.description: estimate the date for 2016's Martin Luther King Day.

task 03.description: estimate the date for 2016's Thanksgiving Day.

task 04.description: estimate the date for 2016's Labour Day.

task 05.description: estimate the date for 2016's Zhonghe Festival.

task 06.description: estimate the date for 2016's Chinese New Year.

task 07.description: estimate the date for 2016's Coming of Age Day.

task 08.description: estimate the date for 2016's Dragon Boat Festival.

task 09.description: estimate the date for 2016's Kadooment Day.

task 10.description: estimate the date for 2016's Tiradentes Day.

task 11.description: estimate the date for 2016's Easter Monday.

task 12.description: estimate the date for 2016's Ascencion Day.

task 13.description: estimate the date for 2016's Nelson Mandela Day.

task 14.description: estimate the date for 2016's Yom Kippur.

task 15.description: estimate the date for 2016's Day of Castile-La Mancha.

task 16.description: estimate the date for 2016's St. Andrews Day.

task 17.description: estimate the date for 2016's Muhammad's Birthday.

task 18.description: estimate the date for 2016's Whit Sunday.
